name: Balloon Clicker (FlashEddieRocks)
description:
Create One Hundred Billion Balloons (100,000,000,000) as fast as you can

In this not so idle clicking game.

Get Clicking! Get Help! Upgrade!

-----------------------------
Can you get onto the High Score Table?

Note: High Score table may be tidied/reset/archived periodically -----------------------------

Mini prototype game created for the GameDev Clicker Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club"
